1: <pb/>A d'a jun tiempoal chi', te ov jun yaelal ix och d'a vin̈aj Ezequías, vanxo scham vin̈. A inxo Isaías in schecab' Dios yuninal in vin̈aj Amoz, ix in c'och d'a vin̈, ix valan d'a vin̈ icha tic: <pb/>—Icha tic yalan Jehová: Alcani tas ol ajcan tastac ay d'ayach, yujto ol ach chamxon̈ej, man̈xo ol ach b'oxoc, xin chi d'a vin̈.
2: <pb/>Ix meltzajoch q'uelan vin̈ d'a sat spat, ix lesalvi vin̈ d'a Jehová icha tic:
3: <pb/>Tzin tevi d'ayach Mamin Jehová, nacoti tas ix vutej ach vac'an servil d'a smasanil in c'ool, ix in c'ulejn̈ej tas ix scha a c'ool, xchi vin̈. Ix te oc' val vin̈ sic'lab'il.
5: to sb'at valxi d'a vin̈aj Ezequías chi' icha tic: A Jehová sDiosal vin̈ a mam icham aj David, a tz'alan icha tic: Ix vab' a lesal, ix vilanpax oq'ui, yuj chi' ol vac' 15 ab'ilocxo a q'uinal.
6: Ol ach in col yed' chon̈ab' Jerusalén tic d'a yol sc'ab' vin̈ sreyal Asiria. Ol in tan̈vej jun chon̈ab' tic, xchi Jehová, xin chi.
21: <pb/>Ix in checan b'ojoc sat te' higo, yic tz'ac'chajoch te' d'a sat jun yab'il chi', yic sb'oxi sc'ool vin̈ yuuj.
22: Ix lajvi chi', ix sc'anb'an vin̈aj Ezequías chi' d'ayin icha tic: <pb/>—¿Tas junoc yechel ol vila' yic ol nachajel vuj to a Jehová ol ac'an b'oxoc in c'ool, yic syal in b'at d'a stemplo? xchi vin̈. Ix in tac'vi icha tic: <pb/>—A jun yechel ol sch'ox Jehová chi' to yel ol elc'och tas ix yala': A juntzan̈ b'achquiltac sch'oxan jantac yec' c'u yic vin̈aj Acaz, ol yac'xi meltzaj Jehová lajun̈eoc b'achquiltac b'aj toxo ix emc'och veven, xin chi. Yuj chi' ix schael yich yemxi lajun̈e' b'achquiltac veven chi'. <pb/>Ayic toxo ix b'oxi sc'ol vin̈aj Ezequías sreyal Judá chi', ix sb'oan jun b'it tic vin̈: <pb/><t>A in naani to tec'an into ol in chamoc. Yujto ix alchaj d'ayin to ayinxooch d'a yol sc'ab' chamel. A in naani to man̈xo ol vil jayeocxo ab'il.</t> <t>Mamin Jehová, ix in na' to man̈xo ol ach vil d'a sat lum tic. Man̈xo ol vilpax junoc eb' cajan d'a yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic valani,</t> <t>yujto a in q'uinal ijan ix sateli, icha tz'aj sjuanem smantiado eb' tan̈vum calnel. A in q'uinal tic, lajan icha tz'aj spoljielta c'apac c'apac b'aj sb'oi. D'a c'ual d'ac'val ix vab' syail uuj.</t> <t>Ix el val vav yuj syail tz'ec' ac'val, ichato a junoc noc' choj scach'an vecchaj in b'aquil. D'a c'ual d'ac'val ix vab'n̈ej syail uuj.</t> <t>C'unxon̈ej yel vav icha noc' san̈capech, ix in c'acvi icha noc' paramuch. Ix in tzactzaj in tan̈van a pactzitan d'ayin. Mamin Jehová, tzin ixtax val svab'i, tac'van̈ d'ayin.</t> <t>Axo ticnaic, ¿tas vach' valan d'ayach? Yujto ix ac' a ti' to tzin ac' b'oxoc, icha chi' ix in utej. Emnaquilal vec' ticnaic yuj in yaelal ix ec' tic.</t> <t>Mamin, yujn̈ej tas tza c'ulej, ay sq'uinal eb' anima, ay pax in q'uinal yed' eb'.</t> <t>A ach ix ac' b'oxoc in c'ool, ix ac'anxi in q'uinal.</t> <t>Ayic ix javi jun yaelal tic d'a vib'an̈, ix in te cusi, axo ticnaic, junc'olal vaji. Ix el d'a a c'ol ix in a colcanel d'a yol sc'ab' chamel, yujto ix b'atcan in mul satc'olal uuj, ichato ix ac'canb'at d'a a patic.</t> <t>A eb' ayxoec' d'a campusante, maxtzac yal yalan vach' lolonel eb' d'ayach. A eb' chamnac chi', ¿tom ol ach yic'chaan̈ eb'? A mach toxo ix emcan d'a yol luum, ¿tom olto yal stan̈van eb' ac'anelc'och tas ix al d'a eb'?</t> <t>An̈ej eb' pitzan syal yalan vach' lolonel d'ayach, icha tz'aj valan d'ayach ticnaic. A eb' mamab'il nunab'il, a eb' tz'alan d'a eb' yalyuninal to tzaq'uelc'och tas tzala'.</t> <t>A Jehová co Columal yaji, yuj chi' yacb'an pitzan on̈, con̈ b'itanec d'a stemplo yed' yamc'ab' yic b'it, xchi vin̈aj Ezequías chi'.</t>
